resources.string:
● Resizable selection area
● Update readme
● Add round icon
● Save last position of floating bar
● Fix crash for Arabic and Hindi
● Update UI/UX\n● Add OCR source site selector\n● Add translation site selector
● Add Lite Mode for quickly usage and more convenient! (Use Google translate app, so you can translate anything without network)
● Fix translation issues for Android 8.0\n● Fix screen capturing failed when device is landscape in some device\n● You can feed OCR result into installed Google Translate
● New setting option [Remember last selection area]\n● Add readme page\n● Add history page
